headline: Why Leidos (LDOS) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of defense contractor Leidos (NYSE:LDOS) jumped 6.2% in the afternoon session after positive news from a peer company sparked a rally across the defense technology sector, with an analyst price target increase providing further support.
